nodes.text: The Last Jedi Adaptation 5 is the fifth, penultimate issue of the comic book miniseries adaptation of Star Wars: The Last Jedi. The issue was written by Gary Whitta, illustrated by Michael Walsh, and published by Marvel Comics on August 1, 2018.

REY CONFRONTS SNOKE AS THE RESISTANCE FACES EXTINCTION! KYLO REN brings REY before the SUPREME LEADER — but who will turn? ADMIRAL HOLDO reveals a stunning plan to save the RESISTANCE! Plus! The return of CAPTAIN PHASMA as FINN and ROSE are betrayed!
